attributes.action: reduce the price of petrol immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petrol is now at over £1.00 per litre again and the price of oil is $70 per barrel. The last time the price of petrol was so high, a barrel cost $149. It is totally unnacceptable that the government has done nothing about this and not only does the price of petrol need to be reduced immediately, some one needs to take responsibility for this utter mess.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
